name: Butcher
description: You know how to work with meat. You have a less chance of making a surgical error when extracting hardspares and softspares.

name: Surgeon
description: The dead won't sue you, but still you need to be careful. You have a reduced chance of making a surgical error when extracting important parts.

name: Scientist
description: You've inhaled a lot of fumes during your experiments. You've developed an inner voice that helps you measure ingredients. You will produce one extra reagent from any material.

name: Cultist
description: Everything has a meaning. You can see White Skull and Red Skull of body parts.

name: Cardinal
description: The church is not only a triumph of the spirit. It's also a number of buildings and properties. You've learned how to manage them, so ceremonies give you extra money.

name: Journalist
description: You notice the little things about people. Put these things together and you have a story. Sometimes you can get a story from dialog.

name: Writer
description: You know how to put words together. Sometimes you even manage to write a good sentence. Mother would be proud.

name: Playwright
description: You write good books. Actually you find you can just write down anything you remember from modern culture.

name: Master Gatherer
description: You love nature and nature loves you back. You can gather more resources from small plants.

name: Farmer
description: You aren't afraid of getting your hands dirty. You can select good seeds and harvest a better crop.

name: Beekeeper
description: You've been bitten so many times that bees can't even damage you any more. So you have plenty of time to collect honey from the beehive.

name: Wine Master
description: You like to drink alcohol-especially wine! Your hangover depends on the alcohol you drank. Moreover, all alcohol you make has a better quality.

name: Blacksmith
description: You like to work with red-hot iron. Hammering relaxes you. And when the work is done, you always manage to find time to make extra nails.

name: Big Guy
description: It appears that if you work with iron a lot, you become big and strong. +1 damage +1 defense.

name: Fireman
description: The spurting flame charms you. You know how to increase productivity, and you can smelt more ore per load.

name: Engineer
description: You know how complex mechanisms work. All the details of your work are top quality. Even your carving and jewelry look cleaner.

name: Sword master
description: You know how to use your blade! You inflict additional damage and probably look cool with your sword.

name: Axeman
description: You know how to use an axe. Chopping a small tree can now give you an additional log. Also, you can make more firewood and wedges from log chunks.

name: Miner
description: You are a true miner. You find precious metals and gems more often, but it's still a matter of luck and energy.

name: Mason
description: You have a gift for stone. You don't even have to try and your stone products will be more beautiful than others'.

name: Architect
description: You have an excellent sense of style. Your buildings look better than usual and are more valuable.
